div.ab:
Once well pulverized & ground on
marble
, & mixed with the aforesaid
sand of
noyau
, and dried slowly without reheating, it endures several casts of
lead
&
tin
.
Copper
&
latten
come out well. But if it is not well ground, like
crocum
, it goes to the bottom, if the
sand
is not tempered thickly enough.
